metadata.name: PEACE【Ukraine Charity Auctions】
metadata.description:
I'm a Japanese illustrator.

The world is in a difficult situation now.
People all over the world are helping each other.
I also want to help people who are suffering.

I can draw pictures.
I drew this illustration for peace.

All profits from the sale of this NFT illustration will be donated directly to the Embassy of Ukraine in Japan.

I wish world peace.
Thank you.

yaki*mayu

Twitter [https://twitter.com/yaki_mayu](https://twitter.com/yaki_mayu)
YouTube [https://www.youtube.com/c/yakimayuru](https://www.youtube.com/c/yakimayuru)
